summary: CONSUMER  SHIFTED GEARS AND VEHICLE STALLED AND THEN SHUT OFF.  A FEW TIMES LATER WHEN THIS HAPPENED HE FELL FROM  MOTORCYCLE.    THIS HAS HAPPENED AT LEAST 6 TIMES.  WHEN HE PUT IT INTO REPAIR SHOP, MECHANIC  COULD NOT DUPLICATE THE  PROBLEM.  *AK    PROBLEM THEREFORE THEY CANNOT FIX THE PROBLEM. HE HAS A YAMAHA XVS1100 2002, WHICH CANNOT BE FOUND IN THE PROGRAM.
